name: Teleportation Circle
description: A magical transportation system provides instant travel between distant locations through dimensional magic. The magical transportation provides instant access to distant locations, while the magical nature and potential magical accidents create constant danger.
atmosphere: Carved runic circles glow with magical energy while reality warps at the boundaries. Ancient symbols pulse with inner light as arcane energies crackle overhead. The air carries ozone and dimensional magic. Focusing crystals and magical components surround the activation area.
